db:abstract.db:para: Controls whether QML Compiler statistics collection is enabled.

db:article.db:para: This variable was introduced in Qt 6.8.3.

When a QML project is configured using qt_add_qml_modules, by default, statistics from the compilation of QML code will be collected. You can explicitly opt in or out of this by setting the QT_QML_GENERATE_AOTSTATS variable. It can be set project-wide by passing
to the CMake executable, or by setting it directly in the corresponding CMakeLists.txt file before the first call to qt_add_qml_module.
